archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0866
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a Revenue Assurance Analyst I want be able to reconcile all usage records from the network to the final customer rated and billed usage records so that we can ensure there is no revenue leakage and we are capturing all revenue for the services we have provided

properties.value: Reted CDRs feed from Comarch is needed

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
